dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
J. Yang
Y. Guo
C. Xiao
W. An
dcterms:description: A novel LF dataset with adjustable baselines to facilitate the study of LF algorithms under baseline variations. It contains 32 synthetic scenes rendered using 3dsMax software, with an angular resolution of 9x9 and a spatial resolution of 1024x1024. Groundtruth depth maps are available for LF depth/disparity estimation methods.
dcterms:title: NUDT

dcterms:creator: M. Rerabek
T. Ebrahimi
dcterms:description: A light field image dataset that provides a collection of light field images for quality assessment and algorithm evaluation.
dcterms:title: EPFL

dcterms:creator: K. Honauer
O. Johannsen
D. Kondermann
B. Goldluecke
dcterms:description: A dataset and evaluation methodology for depth estimation on 4D light fields, providing a benchmark for testing depth estimation algorithms.
dcterms:title: HCInew

dcterms:creator: S. Wanner
S. Meister
B. Goldluecke
dcterms:description: Datasets and benchmarks for densely sampled 4D light fields, useful for evaluating light field processing algorithms.
dcterms:title: HCIold

dcterms:creator: V. Vaish
A. Adams
dcterms:description: The Stanford light field archive, which contains a collection of light field images for research and development purposes.
dcterms:title: INRIA

dcterms:creator: V. Vaish
A. Adams
dcterms:description: The Stanford light field archive, which contains a collection of light field images for research and development purposes.
dcterms:title: STFgantry
